summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3053 for the improvement of Shilshole Avenue, from Twenty-fourth Avenue Northwest to West Forty-fifth Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 36973, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
